about_the_game:
Hey you!

If you've always dreamed of discovering the bumlife,

then welcome to the world of WOYO!

Play as Sam, freshly arrived in Montreuil City (in Paris's outskirts) from his native countryside, who finds himself embroiled in a series of incredible adventures.

Set off to discover this mysterious world, where you'll meet colorful characters who'll help you get to grips with local customs.

Learn to harness the power of the Shtrak to face down the dangerous enemies that stand in your way (pigeons, bandits, stroller moms and other hoodlums) and beat the crap out of them like the madmen that you are ! Will you be able to get out of trouble, or will you find yourself in the middle of it all ?

Your fate is in your own hands!

WOYO!! offers the following features:

-An unpredictable story full of twists and turns.

- A turn-based combat system based on states, leading to deep mechanics.

-A sub-class system for even greater customization of your characters.

​-150+ different enemies! Can you beat them all?

-Three complete neighborhoods to explore and easy navigation through the streets of Montreuil; stroll through a faithful representation of this legendary city.

-Ten colorful playable protagonists.

-Characters more realistic than ever, thanks to our advanced green screen technology.

-The ability to use your phone to make calls, listen to the radio, etc...

-An incredible soundtrack, composed by multiple artists from the french hood and suburbs.

"The most michto of all games" Gamingspot

"Since I started playing WOYO!!!, my street credibility has increased by 2000%.

I've even learned to roll a cigarette !" Francis, building 4, staircase B

"For-mi-dable; I've already booked my next vacation in Montreuil !" Karen, aged 42

"Ohlala, that stuff is crazy" Shtrakmag

The game is playable with keyboard and USB controller.

Follow us on social networks for exclusive info and glimpses of the game's creation.

Instagram: @woyolejeu

highlighted.name: Level 5? Do you want a medal?
Level 10? Yeah, not bad, not bad...

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoon violence and depiction of alcohol and drug abuse.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6100
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.00GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 510
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos

short_description: Play as Sam, freshly arrived in Paris's outskirts from his native countryside, who finds himself embroiled in a rollercoaster ride of adventures. Discover this mysterious world and meet colorful characters who will help you become familiar with local customs.
supported_languages:
French*, English
*languages with full audio support
